isis.stitle: ELECTRICAL SYSTEM TROUBLESHOOTING GUIDE - 9800 - HOOD, GRILLE, AND FENDERS - 5000i, 9000i - INSTALL - INSTALL HOOD SHOCK ABSORBER

svcsubproc.title: Install Hood Shock Absorber on 9100 i (SBA), 9200 i (SBA) and 9400 i (SBA)

step1.para: Carefully tilt the hood to a 45 degree angle. Support the tilted hood with a floor stand to relieve tension on the hood shock absorber, then attach the hood shock absorber to the radiator shock absorber bracket and hood shock absorber bracket as follows.

svcsubproc.para: Refer to Figure 10 for all items in parentheses.

step1.para: Position hood shock absorber (Item 2) at radiator shock absorber bracket (Item 3), then install the retaining pin (Item 1) through the radiator shock absorber bracket and hood shock absorber.
Install cotter pin (Item 1) into retaining pin (Item 1) securing hood shock absorber (Item 2) to the radiator shock absorber bracket (Item 3).
Position hood shock absorber (Item 2) at hood shock absorber bracket (Item 5) then install the retaining pin (Item 4) through the hood shock absorber bracket and hood shock absorber.
Install cotter pin (Item 4) into retaining pin (Item 4) securing hood shock absorber (Item 2) to the hood shock absorber bracket (Item 5).
Close the hood and latch the hood on both sides.
